articles.title: Baltimore Tragedy Highlights Role Of Migrants In US Workforce - NDTV
articles.description: The death of six Latino workers who were fixing potholes when a Baltimore bridge collapsed highlights the crucial role immigrants play in keeping America running, say advocates.
articles.content:
